Articles.Content:
Hey all! I'm Brian. I've been interested in KSP since I read about it on ironmanmode.com. I finally broke down and bought it a few weeks ago and the difference between the current version and the demo is insane! I'm loving all the options I have (including using remotetech/mechjeb!). I play Orbiter a lot, and have a good solid grasp on orbital mechanics, but the ability to design the space craft for the mission is awesome!

So hi, and here's to an awesome kerbal future!
Hello and welcome to the community to an Awesome Kerbal future!
